entries.name: auth_type
entries.desc: The authentication type. WEBrick::HTTPAuth::BasicAuth or WEBrick::HTTPAuth::DigestAuth are built-in.

entries.name: get_passwd(realm, user, reload_db=false)
entries.desc: Retrieves a password in realm for user for the #auth_type of this database.  reload_db is a dummy value.

entries.name: make_passwd(realm, user, pass)
entries.desc: Creates an obscured password in realm with user and password using the #auth_type of this database.

entries.name: set_passwd(realm, user, pass)
entries.desc: Sets a password in realm with user and password for the #auth_type of this database.
